overview: An experimental film in seven parts for continuous projection. With the excepti on of parts 1 and 2, each film can be hired individually. Individual parts as f ollows: Part 1: Sheep (3 mins st.) Part 2: Sheepman (10 mins st.) Part 3: Window (45 mins) Part 4: Lane (18 mins st.) Part 5: Farm (25 mins) Part 6: Blue plus greed plus red (15 mins) Part 7: Sheepwoman (16 mins sd. commag.)
title: The Sheepman and the Sheared
